content: MKS Instruments Inc   which makes instruments used in semiconductor manufacturing processes  said it agreed to buy Newport Corp   a manufacturer of laser-based products  for $980 million in an all-cash deal.
name: MKS Instruments Inc
title: MKS Instruments to buy Newport Corp for $980 million

content: Feb 23 MKS Instruments Inc  which makes instruments used in semiconductor manufacturing processes  said it agreed to buy Newport Corp  a manufacturer of laser-based products  for $980 million in an all-cash deal.
name: MKS Instruments Inc
title: UPDATE 1-MKS Instruments to buy Newport Corp for $980 mln
